attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop shutting special schools and re think inclusion policies.Make local authorities stop using statements of special needs as an admissions criteria for special schools. Make local authoritie decided admissions on need and where the specialist teaching skills are based and not on statements.I would like the goverment to survey local authorities and see how many use this method and see if it is working.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
